posts.message:
As a web beginner, i feel like it's quite overwhelming to keep up with javascript in 2016 especially with those over-engineered frameworks and build tools. 
__

Would appreciate reading your thoughts and comments!

posts.message:
lovely PHP developers of Egypt, I just started a new place for us on GitHub. The newly created page will have jobs, featured repositories, events, news and new people to meet. You're welcome to join!

Apparently, you will need to send your email so I can invite you. Please send yours in a message so I can add you. Thanks
posts.caption: github.com
posts.description: GitHub is where people build software. More than 18 million people use GitHub to discover, fork, and contribute to over 47 million projects.

posts.message:
I am starting writing a series about how to apply agile mindset in solving problems 
Your feedback is appreciated
posts.description:
لما نتكلم عن المواقف يبقي نتكلم اول حاجة علي الفريق و ازاي بيشتغلوا مع بعض ، كنا بنشتغل   coaching مع فريق اول مرة يطبق الagile و فيهم ناس اول مرة يشتغلوا مع بعض ، في الاول اخدوا التدريب و بدأوا المشروع و الحياة جميلة و كلها حماس و بعدين بدأ الشغل بجد و tasks و عايزين نخلص عشان نعمل demo و لازم نعمل test و نحل الissues و هنا بدأ ال conflict الشهير بين الtester و الdeveloper ، انتو بتعملوا testing بطريقة مختلفة لا دي bug لا دي مش bug لا ده انتو مسلمين حاجة مش شغالة ، كل ده عادي و طبيعي بس طبعا بدآ يأثر علي روح الفريق و يعمل احزاب جوا الفريق و الدنيا بدآت تروح في سكة مش هتخلينا ننجز خالص ، هنبقي بنعمل process بس احنا كده فعلا مش agile 
هنا نشوف بقي ازاي فعلا تبقي agile في موقف زي ده
http://wp.me/p7rpMq-3s
#100_Agile_حاجة
#Agile_حاجة_81
#Agile_in_action

posts.message:
This is a *Bro*fessor who taught 30k students via Bootcamps how to code. Now he's offering the course for free, forever.

"I've decided to make my course on complete full-stack web development free forever, here!. It's a massive amount of content. Please let me know what you think of the course!"

posts.message:
For the people inside Egypt
I'm frustrated with all of the VPN service providers
It's always unstable or not working at all
I tried a lot of companie
I need to know based on YOUR OWN experience which one works with you the best
I know that VPN here is somehow being throttled or being screwed with, so that's why I'm asking for your own personal experience
I tried:

1. FrootVPN
2. CactusVPN
3. PrivateInternetAccess
4. AirVPN

So a little help please ?
fellow geeks, anyone knows a good alarming software for winodws or ubuntu? I need a reminder to take a break every one hour or so. thanks
Amazon changed the design of the Amazon Web Services Management Console dashboard. The main new feature is search as you type for services. :)
